name: On thin ice (Nikl)
description:
You find yourself walking on thin ice. Every step cracks the ice below you. Do not walk back over that cracked ice!

For some weird reason, a bunch of cows join you on the ice.

Try to stay on the ice as long as possible. You can see your Highscore in the top right corner. Keep improving it ;)

Controls: Turn the player with A/D or left and right arrow keys.

Submission for Ludum Dare 50 with the theme "Delay the inevitable"
